short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed as a screen share extension for the Disprz application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed for users of the LearnTron application, particularly teachers / instructors to share their screen during an audio-visual / virtual online class.
